sense.def:
Paper
je material, na katerega pišemo ali v katerega zavijamo stvari. Tudi ta knjiga je natisnjena na njem.

seg.quote: Rudolph picked up the piece of paper and gave it to her.

sense.def:
A paper
je druga beseda za
a newspaper
.

seg.quote: I read about the riots in the papers.

sense.def:
Papers
so listi papirja, na katerih so podatki.

seg.quote: He consulted the papers on his knee.

sense.def:
One's papers
so človekovi uradni dokumenti, na primer potni list ali osebna izkaznica.

seg.quote: One of the men had no papers.

sense.def:
A paper
je tudi del pisnega izpita.

A paper
je tudi daljši spis na študijsko ali strokovno temo.

seg.quote: ...a paper on linguistics and literary criticism.

sense.def:
To put one's thoughts down on paper
pomeni zapisati svoje misli.

seg.quote: He had put his suggestions down on paper.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
papers a wall
, steno prekrije s tapetami.

seg.quote: The lounge was papered and painted.
